meanings.definition: A species of grape native to North America.
meanings.sent1: Labruscas are known for their unique flavor.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy snacking on labruscas during the summer.
meanings.sent3: The labruscas at the market looked like tiny jewels.
meanings.sent4: Her backyard vineyard was a sea of labruscas.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of ripe labruscas filled the air at the vineyard.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to grapes of the species labruscas.
meanings.sent1: The labruscas vines grew vigorously in the fertile soil.
meanings.sent2: The winery produced a delicious labruscas wine.
meanings.sent3: She wore a dress the color of labruscas to the grape festival.
meanings.sent4: The labruscas scent in the air signaled the start of harvest season.
meanings.sent5: The labruscas leaves turned a vibrant red in the autumn sun.
